attributes.action: call on the Russian government to hospitalize Vasily Aleksanyan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vasily Aleksanyan was arrested in 2006 just days after he was appointed Vice President of Yukos. He was imprisoned on charges of embezzlement and money laundering. 

He had contracted HIV AIDS, and so required antiretroviral therapy. 

Mr Aleksanyan is being denied life-saving medical treatment and his condition is now critical. There are reports that he has been put in a prison wing for people with infectious diseases.

Russia has ignored repeated injunctions from the European Court of Human Rights requiring that Mr Aleksanyan be hospitalized in a specialist AIDS clinic. 

We call on the prime minister to:
* publicly call for his treatment
* lobby the Russian government to uphold the judgement of the ECHR
